edu.uprb.company

Class HourlyEmployee

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uprb.company.Employee
      • edu.uprb.company.HourlyEmployee

  • public class HourlyEmployee
extends Employee
    Represents a record of a company's hourly Employee.
    Author:
    Luis J. Berríos Negrón

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HourlyEmployee(int employeeId)
      Construct an hourly employee record with the specified employee ID.
      HourlyEmployee(int employeeId, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, Department department, int hoursWorked, double payRate)
      Construct an hourly employee record with the specified employee ID, first name, last name, company Department, amount of hours worked, and hourly pay rate.
